name: Viaje al Centro de La Tierra: Version Extendida
overview: The great adventure of Julio Veme in one of the most ambitious projects of Spanish software. Topo has made a videogame in which all the mystery of the subterranean world narrated by Veme is perfectly reflected. The interior of the volcano, the prehistoric jungle, the lava rivers and all the strange monsters that inhabit the depths will make you live the most exciting adventures. Topo Siglo XXI wanted to contribute with the extension of the two levels that were left in the original version so that 8-bit users have the opportunity to enjoy the complete game, as it was conceived and designed for 16-bit computers. Nothing is impossible, Topo Siglo XXI has tried to make your dreams come true, almost 20 years later... Five levels, now compiled in this tape, will make you relive again the History that one day you could not conclude. Now is the time, there is no excuse for you to discover this adventure from beginning to end.
